sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Hamas has released the first batch of hostages held captive in Gaza as part of a four-day truce 13 Israelis including four children and six women in their 70s and 80s another 12 were citizens of Thailand the International Committee of the Red Cross transported the hostages through Gaza's rafa border crossing with Egypt the IDF later confirmed they had safely arrived on Israeli territory some 39 Palestinians including 15 teenagers were released from Israeli prisons as part of the exchange.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Ahead of their release, Israeli forces used tear gas to disperse crowds forming outside the prison.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The temporary truce will allow much-needed aid to flow into the Gaza Strip.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Since the war began, Israel has barred all imports into Gaza except for a trickle of supplies from Egypt.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: And hospitals, water systems, bakeries and shelters have struggled to keep generators running, forcing the UN to warn that people could starve amid food shortages.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Pedro Sanchez, the prime minister of Spain, and Alexander Dekru, the Prime Minister of Belgium, have together met Egypt's President Abdel Fattah el-Sisi for talks in Cairo.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Whilst there, both European leaders deplored Israel's killings of thousands of civilians in Gaza.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: The indiscriminate killing of innocent civilians, including thousands of boys and girls, are completely unacceptable.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Violence will only lead to more violence.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: The destruction of Gaza is unacceptable.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: We cannot accept that a society is being destroyed the way it is being destroyed.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: In response, Israel reprimanded the ambassadors of both countries.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Gaza's Hamas government estimates that Israel has killed around 15,000 people, two-thirds of them women and children.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Israel says Hamas has killed around 1,200 people, almost all of them Israelis and most of them civilians.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: EU equality ministers have been trying to agree on definitions of consent in talks on a future directive on violence against women.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The informal meeting in Pamplona was part of final phase negotiations on the wording of the EU law, which would establish that any penetration without consent is rape.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Spain's delegates said new kinds of violence against women were emerging. Los delegados de Espa√±a dijeron que nuevas formas de violencia contra las mujeres se estaban creciendo. of the partner or ex-partner, forced marriage or female genital mutilation, among others, are manifestations of the violence that is exercised against women for the simple fact of being women.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: That message was reinforced to the EU's decision-makers by a demonstration against domestic violence in Brussels on Friday. Similar events are planned to take place around the world on Saturday.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Fresh from his triumph in the Netherlands' general election, far-right leader Gerrit Wilders has begun talks with other parties on forming a coalition. He's in pole position to emerge as prime minister after his party for freedom won most seats.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: But his hopes have been hit by the main center-right bloc's leaders' announcement that it won't join a government led by Wilders.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: My feeling after the elections is that with so many seats, 37 seats, the responsibility is great.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: And if you see that another party has also lost something, but does not want to take that responsibility, which is allowed, then I find that very disappointing.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The victory of the anti-Islam, anti-immigration party has been greeted with dismay by the left and groups representing asylum seekers.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: In Utrecht, more than a thousand people took part in a demonstration of support for migrants ahead of the beginning of the coalition talks.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: It's beginning to look a lot like Christmas in Strasbourg.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Everywhere you go, there are traditional chalets as the city's Christmas market comes to town.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: It is Europe's largest Christmas market with some 2.8 million visitors last year, and everyone is in the festive mood.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: City center hotels are at 90% occupancy, and December is often the best month of the year for restaurants.
